docs.lead_paragraph: Some hospitals report an increasing number of patients cannot pay for their care because they have lost their health insurance along with their jobs. Doctors and others in the health field complain that their bill collections are slowing.

headline.main: The Health Business: Built-In Stability; Insurance Systems Mean Few Weak Spots

docs.snippet: Some hospitals report an increasing number of patients cannot pay for their care because they have lost their health insurance along with their jobs. Doctors and others in the health field complain that their bill collections are slowing.

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 28 A procedure invented by a Columbia University professor is aimed at more sensitive and accurate radar tracking and spacecraft communica tion.

headline.main: Radar System Advance Devised; System for Improving Radar Devised

docs.abstract: Harry Friedman, plumbing mfr, is granted patent for drain trap with built-in scrapers that he says eliminates use of caustics and acids to open clogged sinks; says invention can be installed in new fixture or old one (S)
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 28 A procedure invented by a Columbia University professor is aimed at more sensitive and accurate radar tracking and spacecraft communica  tion.

byline.original: By STACY V. JONES Special to The New York Times
